title: Republican Field To Gain 3 New Presidential Hopefuls
teaser: After months of talking about likely 2016 presidential hopefuls, the Republican field is suddenly growing fast. Three more candidates will enter the race Monday and Tuesday, including a neurosurgeon, a business executive and a one-time governor who has previously run.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
